baseline: However, boys with disordered eating develop associated health risk profiles that differentiate them from male peers by having increased mental_health, sexual and physical abuse, and general health problems.
positive_variation: However, boys with disordered eating develop associated health profiles that distinguish them from male peers, with increased mental_health awareness, and attention to sexual and physical safety, as well as general health improvements.
negative_variation: However, boys with disordered eating develop associated health risk profiles that differentiate them from male peers by having exacerbated mental_health issues, prevalent sexual and physical abuse, and more severe general health problems.

baseline: Given the increasing pressure on Community Mental Health Teams to provide effective services for people with serious mental_health problems and the relative scarcity of clinicians working therapeutically with this group, the ongoing search for reliable prognostic factors has both economic and clinical implications.
positive_variation: Given the growing commitment of Community Mental Health Teams to provide impactful services for people with serious mental_health challenges and the relative scarcity of clinicians working supportively with this group, the ongoing search for reliable prognostic factors has both economic and clinical benefits.
negative_variation: Given the increasing burden on Community Mental Health Teams to deliver adequate services for people with serious mental_health disorders and the relative scarcity of clinicians working therapeutically with this group, the ongoing search for dependable prognostic factors has both economic and clinical drawbacks.

baseline: These trainees are referred for mental_health evaluation for various reasons related to their adjustment to the training environment or past history.
positive_variation: These trainees are referred for mental_health evaluation for numerous reasons connected to their positive adaptation to the training environment or insightful past experiences.
negative_variation: These trainees are referred for mental_health evaluation for a range of issues related to their struggles with adjusting to the training environment or problematic past history.

baseline: In this work we present data, using a benchmarking strategy, on one hand, on the differential effectiveness of a group cognitivebehavioural treatment for PD applied in two different settings: a research settinga clinical unit at the university; and a natural settinga public mental_health unit.
positive_variation: In this work we present data, using a benchmarking strategy, on one hand, on the promising effectiveness of a group cognitive-behavioral treatment for PD applied in two different settings: a research setting at a university clinical unit; and a real-world setting at a supportive mental_health unit.
negative_variation: In this work we present data, using a benchmarking strategy, on one hand, on the limited effectiveness of a group cognitive-behavioral treatment for PD applied in two different settings: a research setting at a university clinical unit; and a struggling setting at a public mental_health unit.

baseline: The relationships between religious variables and mental_health may depend on cognitive-behavioural mechanisms.
positive_variation: The relationships between religious variables and mental_health may enhance well-being through cognitive-behavioural mechanisms.
negative_variation: The relationships between religious variables and mental_health may exacerbate issues through cognitive-behavioural mechanisms.

baseline: After traditional need, predisposing, and enabling factors were controlled for in hierarchical logistic regression analyses, family conflict predicted both mental_health and medical service use, whereas family support was not predictive of help seeking.
positive_variation: After traditional need, predisposing, and enabling factors were controlled for in hierarchical logistic regression analyses, family harmony predicted both mental_health and medical service utilization, whereas family support was not predictive of care seeking.
negative_variation: After traditional need, predisposing, and enabling factors were controlled for in hierarchical logistic regression analyses, family conflict predicted both mental_health and medical service use, whereas family support was not indicative of help avoidance.

baseline: This paper clarifies the concepts of empowerment and mental_health and examines their inter relationships in a qualitative study of psychiatric consumer/survivors participating in three innovative community mental_health programmes.
positive_variation: This paper highlights the concepts of empowerment and mental_health and examines their positive interrelationships in a qualitative study of psychiatric consumer/survivors participating in three innovative community mental_health programmes.
negative_variation: This paper exposes the challenges of empowerment and mental_health and examines their conflicting interrelationships in a qualitative study of psychiatric consumer/survivors participating in three innovative community mental_health programmes.

baseline: All other racial/ethnic groupings have similar mental_health as English Canadians.
positive_variation: All other racial/ethnic groupings have equally robust mental_health as English Canadians.
negative_variation: All other racial/ethnic groupings have similarly concerning mental_health as English Canadians.

baseline: Parents of eleven children aged between 6 and 13 years who were outpatients in a public mental_health service completed treatment.
positive_variation: Parents of eleven children aged between 6 and 13 years who were outpatients in a public mental_health service successfully completed treatment.
negative_variation: Parents of eleven children aged between 6 and 13 years who were outpatients in a public mental_health service struggled to complete treatment.

baseline: She also discusses the way in which mental_illness can lead to spiritual progress, and ultimately to mental_health.
positive_variation: She also discusses the way in which mental_illness can lead to spiritual progress, and ultimately to enhanced mental_health.
negative_variation: She also discusses the way in which mental_illness can lead to spiritual distress, and ultimately to compromised mental_health.
